Posts.Content: Sep 25, 2009 07:03PM Rachie_Roo wrote: Hi to all of Heid's 'Breast Friends', I'm one of Heid's best friends and have been blessed to be here with Heid for the last month (I currently live in London).  However I feel compelled to write to all of you, all of you who are part of this fantastic, loving community of women who colaborate and support each other in one of life's worst nightmares.  Thank you so so much for your kind and encouraging words to Heidi throughout her cancer journey, you have been able to reach out to her at levels we as her family and friends cannot even begin to understand.  Thank you!  While also touching all of us in the process I must add.  We all feel wow-ed and totally floored by your responses and beautiful words to someone who initially was a complete stranger. Heid is our beautiful, amazing 'sister' and as you all seem to have realised she is quite a one!  I feel we must all learn from this and I want to encourage you all to live life as fully as you are able and let's all cherish every breathe we are given.   One v. big thank you hug to each of you. Rx
